resume_professionnel: Dynamic sales professional delivering documented success in driving product growth through strong sales skills and patient focus. Detail oriented, utilizing communication skills with a direct and personable approach. Proficient in handling new product launches from inception to completion in both independent and collaborative work environments. Background encompasses almost 15 years of experience in pharmaceutical sales selling to an array of specialties including general practitioners, internal medicine, family practice, endocrinologist, rheumatologist, neurologist, obstetrician/gynecologist, geriatric medicine, orthopedics, pulmonologist, gastroenterology, urology and cardiology. Further call points made to hospital accounts local to territory. Additional professional experience includes nursing experience ranging from surgical assistance to care in the neonatal intensive care unit.

missions: Commercialisation et croissance de produits pharmaceutiques; gestion de lancements de produits du concept à l'exécution.

Vente à un large éventail de spécialités : médecins généralistes, médecine interne, médecine familiale, endocrinologie, rhumatologie, neurologie, obstétrique/gynécologie, gériatrie, orthopédie, pneumologie, gastro-entérologie, urologie et cardiologie.
Appels et comptes hospitaliers locaux au sein du territoire.
2017 - People in Culture Lead for Atlanta East.

2011 - Summit Winner - Ranking 3/55 (141.63% Attainment); Contest Winner - Q1 Kick it in Gear Contest (%NRx Volume Growth); Finished 2nd in Q2 IEM MS-AL Surge Contest (Lyrica TRx Growth); Contest Winner - 2nd Semester Team Contest (Celebrex TRx Growth); First in Region to hit 5% Market Share for Pristiq.

2006 - Finished in Top 15% in Central Area; Ranked #1 in Central Area - Celebrex Attainment (117.78%).

2017 - Xtandi - Ended the year Ranked #15 / 162.
